comments.raw_text: Passing an invalid date/time (either a bad format or a date that can't possibly exist like 2000-13-01) to the WebService should cause it to return an error. It should not cause Bugzilla to crash. So we should have a test that makes sure of this.
comments.creator: mkanat@bugzilla.org
comments.author: mkanat@bugzilla.org
comments.text: Passing an invalid date/time (either a bad format or a date that can't possibly exist like 2000-13-01) to the WebService should cause it to return an error. It should not cause Bugzilla to crash. So we should have a test that makes sure of this.
